name: 范政揆
objective: 以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容,以培養專業設計之能力。
schedule:
W1: Project 1 專題方向簡報
W2: Project 1 概念發展
W3: Project 1 概念發展 Sketch Presentation / A3 Poster x 10 
W4: Project 1 2D Drawing & 1:1 Line drawing 
W5: Project 1 2D Drawing Presentation / A2 or A1 
W6: Project 1 3D Drawing 
W7: Project 1 3D Model Presentation 
W8: Project 1 Rough Mock-up 
W9: Project 1 Final presentation / A1 Poster , Animation 
W10: Project 2 專題方向簡報
W11: Project 2 概念發展
W12: Project 2 概念發展 Sketch Presentation / A3 Poster x 10 
W13: Project 2 2D Drawing & 1:1 Line drawing 
W14: Project 2 2D Drawing Presentation / A2 or A1 
W15: Project 2 3D Drawing 
W16: Project 2 3D Model Presentation 
W17: Project 2 Rough Mock-up 
W18: Project 2 Final presentation / A1 Poster , Animation
scorePolicy:
出勤 10%
平時表現 30% 
設計評圖 60%

schedule:
This course aims to discover potential needs of specific context or user groups following by systematic analysis and proposed solutions.
1.　　Environment Analysis / context interpretation
with problems defined
2.　　Understanding the existing solution and comparison made
3.　　Analysis of required technologies and knowledge
4.　　Possible solution and Feasibility review
